doc:
Howard Culver https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howard_Culver 0 Howard Culver (June 4, 1918 - August 4, 1984) was an American radio and television actor, best known as hotel clerk Howie Uzzell during the entire run of TV's Gunsmoke. On radio he starred in the title role of the Western adventure series Straight Arrow, which aired on Mutual from May 6, 1948 to June 21, 1951. Howard_Culver ( June_4_,_1918 - August_4_,_1984 ) was an_American_radio_and_television_actor , best_known as hotel_clerk_Howie_Uzzell during the_entire_run of TV 's_Gunsmoke . On radio he starred in the_title_role of the_Western_adventure_series_Straight_Arrow , which aired on Mutual from May_6_,_1948 to June_21_,_1951 .
